original_text: and with each lamb, a grain offering of a tenth of an ephah of the finest flour mixed with oil. This is for a burnt offering, a pleasing aroma, a food offering presented to the Lord.
korean_text: 매 어린 양에는 고운 가루 십분의 일에 기름 섞은 소제를 향기로운 번제로 여호와께 화제를 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: a grain offering of a tenth of an ephah
of the finest flour mixed with oil
sentences.korean_translation: 기름에 섞인 가장 좋은 고운 가루

sentences.original_text: This is for a burnt offering
a food offering presented to the Lord
